channel.title: Positos on Rusos.net - Русскоговорящие в Уругвае
channel.description: Recent content in Positos on Rusos.net - Русскоговорящие в Уругвае

item.title: Smoke & Talk Party №3
item.description: Iznachaljno otmenilasj iz-za novogo goda. No plavayusjhaya posidelka po raznyim mestam poluchilasj.

item.title: Smoke & Talk Party №2
item.description: Sluchajno pozvali na vecher itshnikov. Sozdali otdeljnuyu obsjhuyu gruppu dlya vecherinok dlya tekh, kto uzhe priyekhal. Nachali dumatj pro NG.

item.title: Smoke & Talk Party №1
item.description: Poznakomilisj s groverom i poznali azyi masterstva skruchivaniya kosyaka.

item.title: Smoke & Talk Party №0
item.description: V osnovnom itshniki. Pridumali dva startapa.

item.title: Sushi Wok Perú
item.description: Na vkhode stoit lama. Ochenj vkusnyij i simpatichnyij restoran kstati. Lyudi v nyom rabotayut ochenj priyatnyiye. Seviche ne berite. Nu ili tak - siljno na lyubitelya. Kislyatina nevozmozhnaya.
